directions: Spread almond butter onto 1 side of each bread slice. Arrange apples neatly over almond butter on 1 slice of bread; top with carrots and Cheddar cheese. Place second piece of bread on top to make a sandwich.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon almond butter, or to taste
1/2 Granny Smith apple, cored and thinly sliced
title: Easy Vegetarian Sandwich
